message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob.  I'm willing to give you 10% of the money.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more. Let's see if you can do better than that.
Bob, we're both losing money with each passing round. Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to take 40% and leave you with 60%. This way we both get a decent share and can avoid further losses.
I'm not willing to give up that much more. You're getting a better deal than I am, and I think I deserve more. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but not that much.
